name: RUN (itch) (duduhbc, Gucierte, diogari, Bárbara Desirée, lucas2001)
name_original: RUN (itch) (duduhbc, Gucierte, diogari, Bárbara Desirée, lucas2001)
description: RUN is a multiplayer running game, to win, the player must be the first to complete a round-trip while overcoming obstacles and sabotaging his opponents using varied powers found around the track.
